page.title: 03Dunston Farm
page.content: Situated to the north is Dunston Farm owned by W.& C.M. Bains who run the farm entirely by themselves. The 58 hectare farm is of the 'mixed' type producing food and industrial crops including oil-seed rape. There is a moderate number of animals including 42 sheep, 1 horse and 100 cattle. They also grow wheat and hay which is used as a winter feed for the cattle. The farm is highly mechanised using tractors, ploughs, combined harvester, seed drills, fertilizer sprayers, cultivation equipment and roller mills.
